channel.title: Compile+run
channel.description:
me and my friend are creating a private server he has much more knowledge on how to do this but he left to see relatives for week and i was wondering if when i edit the combile+bin file and run it again, should it do this?
The system cannot find the path specified The system cannot find the path specified Press any key to continue. . . . .

item.title: Compile+run
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“spitfire9, post:1, topic:9481”]me and my friend are creating a private server he has much more knowledge on how to do this but he left to see relatives for week and i was wondering if when i edit the combile+bin file and run it again, should it do this?

The system cannot find the path specified
The system cannot find the path specified
Press any key to continue. . . . .[/quote]
@echo off
@title Server

:menu
cls
echo Welcome to SpyderScape
echo Please choose an option:
echo.
echo 1. Start server
echo 2. Compile server
echo 3. Compile and start server
echo 4. Start www.runescape.com
echo 5. Exit
echo.
set /p mode=Please choose an option: 
if %mode%==1 goto run
if %mode%==2 goto compile
if %mode%==3 goto compilerun
if %mode%==4 goto runescape
if %mode%==5 goto exit
goto wrong

:wrong
cls
echo You chose a wrong option!
echo Please choose either option 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5.
echo.
echo Press any key if you wish to go back to the menu . . .
pause > nul
goto menu

:run
cls
java -cp .;./jython.jar server
pause
goto menu

:compile
cls
javac *.java
pause
goto menu

:compilerun
cls
echo Compiling . . .
javac *.java
echo Compiled - finished.
java -cp .;./jython.jar server
echo Server started!
pause

:runescape
cls
echo Now launching Runescape through Mozilla Firefox . . .
start firefox http://www.runescape.com
pause
goto menu

:exit
exit

Creds to whoever made this.

Read full topic
